dbwebdescriptor.label: Retrieve all fields from an entity from DBNode
dbwebdescriptor.description: Retrieve all fields from an entity from DBNode

queries.querystring: SELECT is_c.TABLE_NAME AS 'Table', is_c.COLUMN_NAME AS 'Name', is_c.IS_NULLABLE AS 'Nullable', is_c.COLUMN_TYPE AS 'DataType', is_c.COLUMN_COMMENT AS 'Comment', GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(is_s.INDEX_NAME,'(',SEQ_IN_INDEX,')') SEPARATOR ';') AS 'Index' FROM information_schema.columns AS is_c LEFT JOIN information_schema.statistics is_s ON is_s.TABLE_SCHEMA=is_c.TABLE_SCHEMA AND is_s.TABLE_NAME = is_c.TABLE_NAME AND is_s.COLUMN_NAME=is_c.COLUMN_NAME WHERE '@TableName' != '' AND is_c.TABLE_SCHEMA='dbnode' AND is_c.TABLE_NAME = '@TableName' GROUP BY is_c.COLUMN_NAME
